com.unvired.lib.utility

Class ProcessAgentUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unvired.lib.utility.ProcessAgentUtility

  • public class ProcessAgentUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    ProcessAgentUtility is a utility class for use by process agents to perform commonly used functions. The following is the list of supported functions:
    • Alpha conversion of strings
    • Date and Time parsing
    • Hexadecimal encoding of byte stream

      • parseSAPDate

        public static java.sql.Date parseSAPDate(java.lang.String date)
        Converts a string in JDBC date escape format to a Date object.
        Parameters:
        date - - Date in yyyy-MM-dd format
        Returns:
        Date object if valid input or null otherwise

      • parseSAPTime

        public static java.sql.Time parseSAPTime(java.lang.String time)
        Converts a string in JDBC time escape format to a Time object.
        Parameters:
        time - - Time in hh:mm:ss format
        Returns:
        Time object if valid input or null otherwise

      • alphaConversionSAPIn

        public static java.lang.String alphaConversionSAPIn(java.lang.String value,
                                                    int length)
        Performs an alpha conversion on the input. i.e. If the input string is numeric then it is padded with leading zeros limited by the length parameter No changes are made to the input if it is not numeric.
        Parameters:
        value - - Value to be alpha converted
        length - - Size of the resulting string
        Returns:
        Alpha converted value

      • alphaConversionSAPOut

        public static java.lang.String alphaConversionSAPOut(java.lang.String value)
        Performs a reverse alpha conversion on the input. i.e. If the input string is numeric then all leading zeros are removed No changes are made to the input if it is not numeric.
        Parameters:
        value - - Value to be alpha converted
        Returns:
        Alpha converted value

      • bytesToHexString

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHexString(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte stream to hexadecimal representation.
        Parameters:
        bytes - - Byte stream
        Returns:
        Hexadecimal representation

      • hexStringToBytes

        public static byte[] hexStringToBytes(java.lang.String hexString)
        Converts a hexadecimal representation to its original byte stream.
        Parameters:
        hexString - - Hexadecimal representation
        Returns:
        Original byte stream
